tagline: Argus GSI PEP callout for Globus
name: Argus GSI PEP Callout
body:
## Argus GSI PEP Callout

This is the Argus Authorization Service GSI PEP Callout module for the 
Globus Authorization Callouts framework.

### Documentation

Argus Authorization Services documentation https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/EGEE/AuthorizationFramework

Globus Authorization Callouts documentation http://www.globus.org/toolkit/security/callouts/

#### GSI PEP Callout documentation 

* https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/EGEE/AuthZPEPGSIInfo
* https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/EGEE/AuthZPEPGSIInstall
* https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/EGEE/AuthZPEPGSIConfig
* https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/EGEE/AuthZPEPGSITroubleshooting
